ZT2Strings.LOC_STRING: Have at least four carnivores and six herbivores in a savannah exhibit
Oh no! You did not meet the requirements for the number of carnivores and herbivores!
Great work! You have met the initial requirements for the savannah carnivores and herbivores!
Run the savannah exhibit for four months without getting any herbivores injured
Oh no! One of your carnivores have killed a herbivore.
Great work! You have managed to run the savannah exhibit without any herbivores getting injured!
